function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of inaccurate data on social platforms causing panic and fear.","Impact":"Panic and fear may lead to uncontrolled spread of the disease.","Mitigation":"Verification of data accuracy and real-time updates using blockchain technology.","Technologies":"Blockchain technology for data verification and real-time updates.","People":"Patients, healthcare professionals, and the general public.","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, social media platforms."},{"Description":"Unsafe and unsecure movement of healthcare instruments during the pandemic.","Impact":"Risk of contaminated healthcare instruments spreading the disease.","Mitigation":"Tracking and recording the movement of healthcare instruments using blockchain technology.","Technologies":"Blockchain technology for tracking and recording movement of healthcare instruments.","People":"Healthcare workers, patients, and the general public.","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government health departments."},{"Description":"Ineffective monitoring of quarantine cases and slow drug supply.","Impact":"Delayed treatment and slower recovery of infected patients.","Mitigation":"Monitoring quarantine cases and enabling faster drug supply using blockchain technology.","Technologies":"Blockchain technology for monitoring quarantine cases and enabling faster drug supply.","People":"Infected patients, healthcare professionals, and the general public.","Owner":"Government health departments, healthcare organizations."}]}
